casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Anthony Ray SOLOMON 178P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2019 Hal Askins, Special Deputy Attorney General, Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, Susan I. Doyle, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina Anthony Ray Solomon, for Solomon, Anthony Ray.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of May 2019 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of June 2019."
